revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #13 Wepear |image = [[File:Wepear.png]] |caption = The potent mix of bitter and sour in this Berry seems to promote digestion. The flower is white and beautiful. |growtime = 6m 40s |harvest = 12 berries |replant = 40% |mutation = 0.016 |points = 30 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *10 sour }} '''Wepear''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Rawst]] and at least 1 [[Oran]]. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 2 mins 30 secs || 5 mins 50 secs || 6 mins 15 secs || 6 mins 40 secs - 13 mins 20 secs |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WepearTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WepearTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WepearTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 6 mins 40 secs -
13 mins 20 secs |- ! Sprayduck | 4 mins 27 secs -
8 mins 53 secs |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Wepear_Flow_Chart.png|200px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Wepear berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]] [[Oran]] |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]] [[Oran]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]]
[[Oran]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]] [[Oran]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]]
[[Oran]] |} === Timing Table === {| class="collapsible wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with

Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Oran]] || - || - || - |- | [[Rawst]] || 1 min 20 secs until ripe || 53 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |} {{Berries}}
